Five tools for your toolbox


1. Parallelism - “some see... we see...”


2. Alliteration - “wonky... wonderful”


3. Implied metaphor - “Rescue...”


4. Tricolon - “too big” “too small” “too many”


5. Repetition - “Buy Odd, buy Oddbox”
